summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Desideri di Puglia B&B booking site. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI fully functional with proper navigation, room displays, booking flow, and Stripe integration ready.

design_issues.issue: Calendar may need better date availability highlighting for user experience

passed_tests: All 11 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section and navigation
Rooms page shows both rooms with €80/night pricing
Room detail pages with image galleries
Booking page with room selection and calendar
Admin panel shows room management with price editing (€80 displayed correctly)
Stripe checkout integration configured and ready
